author: ngn
msg: Adding decent logging of exceptions (FTPSERVER-56). Thanks to Mark Proctor for the suggestion.

author: mturyn
msg: Added another option to the combo box.
Altered debugging to reflect new, fixed, version---"_debugAll" actually works that way now, no need to specify classes that J.i.T.-load to bring them in.

author: mturyn
msg: Now we write to the HEAD element of the page if it's there; has the advantage of working even after the HEAD's been closed, e.g. for mCO debugging or JIT-loaded components.
